s: You can return many eligible items sold on Amazon.com. When you return an item, you may see different return options depending on the seller, item, or reason for return.

t: What is an ad exchange? Here’s everything you need to know
s: September 9, 2022 - An ad exchange is technology used in programmatic advertising that facilitates the buying and selling of digital inventory using real-time bidding.

t: Amazon.in: Bank and Exchange offer
s: The exchange offer you receive on Amazon.in and the proposed exchange value is provided by third party buyback partners. The offer may vary depending on the brand and model selected, your delivery location and availability of the offer by the buyback partner at the time of placing the order.
